DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy iStent trabecular micro-bypass stent reduce intraocular pressure ( IOP ) subject open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension co-existing cataract .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Trabecular Micro-bypass Stent Combination With Cataract Surgery Subjects With Open Angle Glaucoma
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy iStent trabecular micro-bypass stent reduce intraocular pressure ( IOP ) subject open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension co-existing cataract . Pre-operative unmedicated baseline pressure compare post operative value study arm .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed openangle glaucoma ( OAG ) study eye . Pseudoexfoliative pigmentary glaucoma also acceptable diagnosis . Subject least one glaucoma medication Able willing attend follow visit two year post operative Able willing sign inform consent Prior glaucoma procedure ( eg trabeculectomy , viscocanalostomy , ALT , SLT , shunt implant , collagen implant , cyclo destructive procedure etc ) Angle closure glaucoma Fellow eye already enrol
